parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: Reference to the service request.

parameters.description: The classification of the type of observation

parameters.description: The code of the observation type

parameters.name: combo-code
parameters.description: The code of the observation type or component type

parameters.name: combo-data-absent-reason
parameters.description: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] or Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

parameters.name: combo-value-concept
parameters.description: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

parameters.name: combo-value-quantity
parameters.description: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

parameters.name: component-code
parameters.description: The component code of the observation type

parameters.name: component-data-absent-reason
parameters.description: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

parameters.name: component-value-concept
parameters.description: The value of the component observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

parameters.name: component-value-quantity
parameters.description: The value of the component observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

parameters.name: data-absent-reason
parameters.description: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: Related measurements the observation is made from

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The Device that generated the observation data.

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Encounter related to the observation

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: The focus of an observation when the focus is not the patient of record.

parameters.name: has-member
parameters.description: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique id for a particular observation

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The method used for the observation

parameters.name: part-of
parameters.description: Part of referenced event

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

parameters.name: performer
parameters.description: Who performed the observation

parameters.name: specimen
parameters.description: Specimen used for this observation

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the observation

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject that the observation is about

parameters.name: value-concept
parameters.description: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

parameters.name: value-date
parameters.description: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

parameters.name: value-quantity
parameters.description: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

parameters.name: value-string
parameters.description: The value of the observation, if the value is a string, and also searches in CodeableConcept.text

bodySite.description: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the observation was made (i.e. the target site).

focus.description: What the observation is about, when it is not about the subject of record

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

interpretation.description: A categorical assessment of an observation value.  For example, high, low, normal.

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

method.description: Indicates the mechanism used to perform the observation.

note.description: Comments about the observation or the results.

specimen.description: The specimen that was used when this observation was made.

status.description: The status of the result value.

subject.description: Who and/or what the observation is about

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

referenceRange.description: Provides guide for interpretation of component result
